sentences.sentence: Revised and polished over two decades, that work became "Jitney", part of an ambitious series of ten plays, each set in a different decade of the 20th century and all save one in the Hill District.
sentences.translation: 经过了20年的修改和润色，这部作品成为了名为《五分硬币》十部系列剧之一。 每一部都对应着20世纪的各个不同的年代，且除了一部以外，都以希尔区为背景。
